title: 40 in. Pro Stainless Steel Floral Shovel
description: The PRO Floral Shovel includes a handy, small-headed blade that is designed to be big enough to move plants and flowers, but small enough to be easy to use. Radius PRO Stainless tools feature a large O Handle with 4-times the gripping surface of conventional tools with room for both hands. These tools also include a resin-encased steel core handle that is virtually unbreakable.
